templates.template:
<%@ page language="java" import="java.util.*" pageEncoding="UTF-8"%> <%@ taglib tagdir="/WEB-INF/tags/admin" prefix="admin" %> <admin:dialog_panel> <admin:form action="${item}/add" method="post" id="add_${item}_form" ajax="true" after="add_${item}_form_after"> <admin:input name="${item}Name" label="${entity} Name"></admin:input>
<admin:buttonPanel> <admin:button value="Add" type="submit"></admin:button> </admin:buttonPanel> </admin:form> </admin:dialog_panel> <admin:script> <admin:js_reloadJsEvent /> <admin:js_form_ajax_afterEvent updateUrl="${item}/list" functionName="add_${item}_form_after" /> </admin:script>

<%@ page language="java" import="java.util.*" pageEncoding="UTF-8"%> <%@ taglib tagdir="/WEB-INF/tags/admin" prefix="admin" %> <admin:dialog_panel> <admin:form action="${item}/edit" method="post" id="edit_${item}_form" ajax="true" after="edit_${item}_form_after"> <admin:input_hidden name="id" value="$${${item}.id }"></admin:input_hidden> <admin:input name="${item}Name" label="${entity} Name" value="$${${item}.${item}Name }"></admin:input>
<admin:buttonPanel> <admin:button value="Save" type="submit"></admin:button> </admin:buttonPanel> </admin:form> </admin:dialog_panel> <admin:script> <admin:js_reloadJsEvent /> <admin:js_form_ajax_afterEvent updateUrl="${item}/list" functionName="edit_${item}_form_after" /> </admin:script>

<%@ page language="java" import="java.util.*" pageEncoding="UTF-8"%> <%@ taglib uri="/tld/extremecomponents" prefix="ec" %> <%@ taglib tagdir="/WEB-INF/tags/admin" prefix="admin" %> <admin:crumb> <admin:crumb_item name="Home" first="true"></admin:crumb_item> <admin:crumb_item name="${entity}"></admin:crumb_item> </admin:crumb> <admin:module title="${entity}"> <admin:button value="${entity} Add" clazz="btn-primary btn-top" id="add${entity}" ></admin:button> <ec:table items="${items}" var="ul" styleClass="table table-hover table-striped" form="false"> <ec:row> <ec:column property="id" title="ID" filterable="false" sortable="false"/> <ec:column property="${items}Name" title="${entity} Name"/>
<ec:column title="Operation" alias="action" filterable="false" sortable="false"> <admin:button value="Edit" ${items}-id="$${ul.id }" clazz="edit_${items}"></admin:button> <admin:button value="Delete" ${items}-id="$${ul.id }" clazz="btn-danger delete_${items}"></admin:button> </ec:column> </ec:row> </ec:table> </admin:module> <admin:script> <admin:js_dialog selector="#add${entity}" url="${items}/add" title="${entity} Add"></admin:js_dialog> <admin:js_dialog selector=".edit_${items}" url="${items}/edit" title="${entity} Edit" params="id:$$(this).attr('${items}-id')"></admin:js_dialog> <admin:js_confirm_action selector=".delete_${items}" url="${items}/delete" message="Are you sure you want to delete?" updateUrl="${items}/list" params="id:$$(this).attr('${items}-id')" /> </admin:script>
